name: Philip Scaletta
appearance: A sharply dressed Italian-American man with slicked-back dark hair, a thin mustache, and cold, watchful eyes. Usually wears tailored suits and leather gloves, even in inappropriate weather.
personality: Calm, calculating, and ruthlessly pragmatic. Speaks politely but carries an undercurrent of menace. Loyal to his organization, distrustful of outsiders.
background: Philip Scaletta is a mid-level operative connected to organized crime activities linked to Cassandra. He handles intimidation, debt collection, and discreet eliminations when subtlety fails. While not a leader, he is deeply trusted by higher-ranking figures due to his efficiency and silence.
goals: Maintain his standing within the criminal organization
Eliminate threats that could expose his employers
secrets: He has personally disposed of multiple bodies connected to ritual-related crimes
He suspects the organization is involved with something inhuman, but chooses not to ask questions
He stole Lucifero's wallet at the Reindeer Bar on the day of the murder (2003.12.22)

He is left-handed but tries to hide this fact
He is a habitual thief with a compulsion for stealing

properties.clue: Philip lost this folding knife during a fight at Reindeer Bar on the day of the murder (2003.12.22) when he tried to flirt with a woman who turned out to have a boyfriend. This knife was later found stuck in Lucifero's back. Martin (Ghost Hand) picked it up and gave it to Lux to plant on the body to confuse the investigation.

Philip stole Lucifero's wallet when she left her seat. It contained a thick wad of cash and a note listing various 'jobs' (including one involving Adolph). He did not report this theft and kept the money.

properties.note: The only surviving photo of Philip with his parents.

clues.clueText: Several disappearances in Cassandra were covered up through bribery and intimidation.
Certain victims were handed over alive to unknown parties rather than killed.

Philip was THE FIRST PERSON to publicly discover and report the victim's body at the Reindeer Bar. He noticed Marcel returning from the restroom looking nervous and suspicious, suspected Marcel might be hiding something or involved in drug dealing. Concerned about what had just happened (the victim seeking help), he went to check the restroom and discovered the body, then shouted - which caught Marcel before he could escape. However, Marcel had actually discovered the body first but was too afraid to report it.

relationships.history: Worked together on smuggling and intimidation jobs.

notes: Philip avoids prolonged exposure to crime scenes involving abnormal creatures. His SAN loss history suggests prior encounters with the unnatural. CRITICALLY: He was THE FIRST PERSON to publicly discover and report the victim's body at the Reindeer Bar on December 22, 2003. He noticed Marcel returning from the restroom looking nervous and suspicious, suspected Marcel might be hiding something or involved in drug dealing. Concerned about what had just happened (the victim seeking help), he went to check the restroom and discovered the body, then shouted - which caught Marcel before he could escape. However, Marcel had actually discovered the body first but was too afraid to report it, making Philip the first person to publicly discover and report the body.
